Module cerei
Package au.org.nifpi.cerei

Class Cost

java.lang.Object
au.org.nifpi.cerei.Cost
public class Cost extends Object
Calculates and Summarises Cost data from the Source Usage and Spot Price .csv files TO DO - Refactor. Contains a lot of duplicated code here and also in PEI.
Author:
Copyright (c) 2023 University of Technology Sydney and Federation University under MIT License.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cost

      public Cost(List<String> meterNames, int year)
      Creates the per meter per month data structure and loads meter names from the usage file. Usage file is source of truth for meter names.
      Parameters:
      meterNames - List of meter names.
      year - Year for which data is being processed.

  • Method Details

    • addMonthlyParameters

      protected void addMonthlyParameters(NetworkParameter networkParameters) throws Exception
      Read the tariff data structure (which contains more information than just tariff information) to insert loss ratios, Demand Critical Peak Usage. and Demand Capacity Usage into the relevant CostPerMonth object.
      Parameters:
      networkParameters - Network Parameter data structure.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there are no monthly parameters in the Network Tariff file for a meter in the usage file.

    • addCharges

      public void addCharges(NetworkParameter networkParameters, LocalDateTime recordDateTime, String[] usageSt, String[] priceSt, String[] generatedSt, String[] feedInSt, HashMap<Integer,Integer> generatedMeterMap)
      Allocate usage energy and generation power contained in a single line (and matched) line of the Energy Usage, Spot Price, Energy Generated and Feed-in Tarrif files to each meter and month. TO DO - Refactor. Has grown to be difficult to follow with repeated code.
      Parameters:
      networkParameters - Energy charge, Network charge, Spot Energy, Market charge and Other Charge Loss ratios and pricing.
      recordDateTime - Date and Time of the lines in the Energy Usage, Spot Price, Energy Generated and Feed-in Tarrif files.
      usageSt - Line from the Energy Usage file.
      priceSt - Line from the Spot Price file.
      generatedSt - Line from the Energy Generated file.
      feedInSt - Line from the Feed-in Tariff file.
      generatedMeterMap - Maps the column in the Energy Generated file to the right column of the Energy Usage file.

    • calculateCosts

      public void calculateCosts(NetworkParameter networkParamenters) throws Exception
      Calculate the per month costs once all the data has been read in from the usage and price files and processed
      Parameters:
      networkParamenters - Energy charge, Network charge, Spot Energy, Market charge and Other Charge Loss ratios and pricing.
      Throws:
      Exception - Rethrows an exception from any called method.

    • createRealMeterCostSummaries

      public List<MeterSummary> createRealMeterCostSummaries()
      Create a summary of the monthly cost data that can be eventually displayed on the Cost Summary pane of the UI
      Returns:
      Meter by Meter list of summarised costs for each month, quarter and year.

    • createTotalMeterCostSummay

      protected MeterSummary createTotalMeterCostSummay(List<MeterSummary> realMeterSummaries)
      Create a "Grand Total" that sums up all meters by month, quarter and year. Easily modified so that it can be used to generate sub-total meter summaries.
      Parameters:
      realMeterSummaries - List of meters to be totaled.
      Returns:
      Grand total meter information in the same format as real or summary meters, null if no meters in input list.

    • createTotalMeterPeiSummary

      protected MeterSummary createTotalMeterPeiSummary(List<MeterSummary> realMeterSummaries) throws Exception
      Deprecated.
      since version 1.0.1.0
      Create a "Grand Total" PEI that calculates "total PEI" for all meters monthly, quarterly and yearly. Easily modified so that it can be used to generate sub-total PEI summaries.
      Parameters:
      realMeterSummaries - List of meters to be included in total PEI.
      Returns:
      Grand total PEI information in the same format as real or summary meters, null if no meters in input list.
      Throws:
      Exception - Rethrows exceptions from called methods - most likely divide by zero exception when calculating PEIs

    • createSummaryCostTableModel

      public CEREITableModel createSummaryCostTableModel()
      Create the table model to display the costs in the "Energy Costs" pane of the Energy Calculator.
      Returns:
      Table model containing Energy Costs

    • createSummaryTableModel

      public CEREITableModel createSummaryTableModel(List<MeterSummary> allMeterSummaries)
      Convert the information in MeterSummary form to a TableModel form.
      Parameters:
      allMeterSummaries - Costs in MeterSummary Form.
      Returns:
      Table model containing Energy Costs.

    • createSummaryOutput

      protected String[][] createSummaryOutput(List<MeterSummary> meterSummaries)
      Convert the information in MeterSummary form to a 2-dimensional array of Strings.
      Parameters:
      meterSummaries - Costs in MeterSummary Form.
      Returns:
      Two dimensional array containing Energy Costs.

    • calculateEnergyExported

      public double calculateEnergyExported()
      Calculates the total amount of energy exported to the grid after whatever generated energy is used to offset energy that would otherwise come from the grid.
      Returns:
      Total amount of energy exported to the grid

    • calculateEnergyGenerated

      public double calculateEnergyGenerated()
      Calculates the total amount of energy generated.
      Returns:
      Total amount of energy generated.

    • getColumnNames

      public String[] getColumnNames()
      Allow other classes to get hold of the column names but NOT change them.
      Returns:
      Names of columns in summary Jtables
